# SVG Injector

Inject SVG as a child of the provided element.

## Example

SVG Injector will take `.icon-umbrella` background image and inject it into the dom under `#MyIcon`.


### Install
Project is still in development. Not yet on NPM.
`npm install lukejamesk/svg-injector`

### Html
```
<span class="icon icon-umbrella" id="MyIcon"></span>
```

### Javascript
```
import { SVGInjector } from "svg-injector"

let svgInjector = new SVGInjector({
	cssFilePath: "/path/to/file.css"
});

let element = document.getElementById('MyIcon');


// Alternatively  for use on an element not yet in the dom.
// let element = document.createElement("span");
// element.classes = "icon icon-umbrella";

svgInjector.inject(element);

```

### CSS
```
.icon-umbrella {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    background-image:
